title: Apple alert: Indian opposition leaders raise alarm about warning
description: Around a dozen opposition MPs say they got an alert about 'state-sponsored attackers' targeting their phone.
content:
A row has broken out in India after several opposition leaders and journalists received a warning from Apple about "state-sponsored attackers" targeting their phone.
